import React, {useState} from 'react'; const Contact = (props) => { const dataLocal = props.dataLocal const [message, setMessage] = useState({ name:'', email:'', subject:'', content:'', sent:null, disabled:false }) function handleChange(event) { setMessage({...message, [event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() setMessage({...message, disabled:true}) setMessage({...message, sent:true}) } const display = (
